House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01025
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MODERNIZING THE PUBLIC LAND TRANSPORTATION INDUSTRY AND CREATING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE LAND TRANSPORTATION FRANCHISING COMMISSION, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Public Land Transportation Industry Modernization Act
ABSTRACT : Creates the Land Transportation Franchising Commission (LTFC) under Department of Transportation and Communication (DOTC) to forecast the transportation requirement each year as the basis for issuances of Certificate of Public Conveniences (CPCs).
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MANALO, JESULITO A.

SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
